description: Make Thai green curry at home. This chicken curry recipe is loaded with flavour from zesty kaffir lime and spicy red chilli.
name: Green Curry with Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add chicken, chilli & kaffir lime leaves (if desired) and return to boil. Once chicken is cooked, add basil if using before removing from heat. Serve with steamed rice.
